attributes.action: initiate proceedings to erect a statue of Spike Milligan in a prominent position in Catford.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spike is the creator of all things funny, before him humour did not exist in this country and he should be honoured in an appropriate manner. What better way to do this than erect a statue of him blowing a raspberry and genuflecting in a manner suitable towards Westminster.
I humbly request that this be done to honour the man who has on his tombstone the immortal:
"Duirt me leat go raibh me breoite"
("I told you I was ill")
"Love, light, peace".

rejection.details: This is a local authority matter.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
